success.title: Verification complete
success.body: Your identity is confirmed. Explore Wolf Den without limits.

intro.title: Verify with Self
intro.body: Scan the QR with the Self app to sync your identity with the pack.
intro.mobile: Open the Self app on this device to sync your identity with the pack.
intro.mobileHint: The button launches the Self app. Once approved, you’ll return here automatically.
intro.mobileUnavailable: Mobile deep link not configured yet. Set NEXT_PUBLIC_SELF_DEEPLINK_CALLBACK to enable the button.
intro.mobileQrHidden: QR hidden on mobile. Enable it above if you need to scan from another device.

missingConfig.title: Self verification unavailable
missingConfig.body: Set the following env vars before verifying: {vars}.
missingConfig.hint: Add them to .env.local and restart the dev server.

missingWrapper.title: Self QR unavailable
missingWrapper.body: The QR component from @selfxyz/qrcode is not available. Check the package version.

hero.label: Identity & Trust
hero.description: Secure your identity to unlock voting, check-ins, and pack perks. Scan with the Self app to confirm.

tips: • Make sure you're on a trusted network.
• If it fails, refresh the QR and try again.

AccessGate.title: Welcome to Den Labs
AccessGate.subtitle: Complete these steps to get started.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

status.profileSaved: Profile saved. You can continue whenever you’re ready.

profile.title: 2. Claim your handle
profile.copy: Choose a unique handle to unlock the lab. This is required before entering.
profile.handleInvalid: Handles must be 3–32 letters, numbers, . _ - (no spaces).

optional.title: 2. Connect your wallet (optional)
optional.copy: Optional. Needed for payouts and rewards.

required.title: 1. Connect your wallet to continue
required.copy: Spray needs a wallet to send on-chain rewards.

messages.profileFirst: Save your profile before connecting a wallet.

wallet.skip: No rush — you can connect a wallet anytime from Settings.
wallet.skipMessage: You can skip this step and connect your wallet later.

self.title: 3. Boost trust score
self.copy: Optional. Verify with Self.xyz for more perks.
self.requireWallet: Connect a wallet first to link your Self profile.
self.skip: All good — come back when you’re ready to verify.

continue.title: Enter Lab
continue.hintWallet: Connect a wallet to continue to Spray.
continue.hintHandle: Claim a handle to unlock the lab.

LabPage.title: Welcome back, {name}
LabPage.subtitle: This is your Den Labs home. Missions, Spray, Taberna, and insights plug in here as we wire them up.

intro.title: Mines
intro.description: Mind Games MVP flows. Keep the original look while we wire Self-powered logic.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Toggle themes to match your workspace.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the locale for navigation and content copy.

hero.title: DenLabs: Feedback & Proof Lab
hero.subtitle: Ship. Get feedback. Prove it.
hero.description: Instead of building in isolation, DenLabs provides structured feedback loops, experimental features to test hypotheses, and onchain proof generation to build reputation.

experiments.label: Active Experiments
experiments.title: Test, Learn, Prove
experiments.description: Run experiments with real users and onchain data.

highlights.label: Why organizers pick the lab
highlights.title: Three moves sponsors notice instantly
highlights.description: Every activation stays verifiable: payouts fire on-chain, Self.xyz guards the points economy, and the recap hits your blog before attendees head home.

items.title: Payout proof in real time
items.description: Mini-games fire audited contracts the instant a champion wins, surfacing hashes and receipts sponsors can trust.

items.title: Self.xyz-powered trust wall
items.description: Attendees clear Self verification before earning points or rewards, keeping bots out and engagement metrics defensible.

items.title: Recaps that write themselves
items.description: Verified outcomes stream into the storytelling engine so you publish sponsor-grade recaps before the crowd heads home.

metrics.label: KPIs we're locking in
metrics.title: Pilot targets grounded in product vision
metrics.description: Wolf Den Labs measures success through automated payouts, satisfied organizers, activated sponsors, and mentors verified with Self.xyz.

pillars.label: Strategic Pillars
pillars.title: How the lab delivers the vision
pillars.description: Wolf Den Labs merges our builder DNA with live operations so payouts, mentorship, and sponsor value stay in the same flow.

items.title: Instant Rewards Engine
items.description: Ruleta and race engines wired to smart contracts deliver on-chain payouts the moment the spotlight lands on a winner.

items.title: Unified Ops Panel
items.description: Ops Leads design flows, supervise prize pools, and broadcast hero moments from a single mission control.

items.title: Verified Community Loop
items.description: Self.xyz verification and Taberna itineraries keep mentors, attendees, and sponsors circling the story before, during, and after the event.

HomeLanding.modulesDescription: Operate events, automate payouts, activate sponsors, and guide community follow-ups without leaving Wolf Den Labs.

modules.title: Event Control Panel
modules.description: Prime the agenda, import attendee rosters, and stage prize pools with receipts sponsors can audit.

modules.title: Auto Payout Engines
modules.description: Spin up ruleta and race engines, route rewards through smart contracts, and watch the prize wheel narrate itself.

modules.title: Self.xyz Identity Gate
modules.description: Confirm mentors and attendees through Self before sessions, gating rewards and dashboards for verified humans only.

modules.title: Taberna Mentorship
modules.description: Route builders into mentorship itineraries that capture momentum and convert it into follow-on sessions.

modules.title: Analytics & Reporting
modules.description: Surface payouts, engagement, and retention trends with dashboards sponsors can export and route to decks.

modules.title: Sponsor Activations
modules.description: Stage branded skins, micro-dispersions, and recap packages so every partner walks away with proof of impact.

modules.title: Builder Extensions
modules.description: Deploy quests and automations from the pack to stretch the event loop into ongoing builder momentum.

flows.label: End-to-end Journey
flows.title: How Ops Leads run Wolf Den Labs

items.title: Configure & verify
items.description: Set the agenda, import attendee wallets, define prize pools, and confirm mentors behind the Self.xyz trust wall.

items.title: Run live experiences
items.description: Trigger ruleta and race engines, stream smart-contract payouts, and spotlight sponsor activations in real time.

items.title: Measure & extend
items.description: Review live analytics, export proof for sponsors, and route the community into Taberna follow-ups that sustain the story.

items.title: Verified recaps
items.description: Publish event summaries backed by Self.xyz data so sponsors and community see the undeniable impact.

items.title: Mentor spotlights
items.description: Highlight mentors and Taberna sessions that kept momentum surging after the main stage lights dim.

items.title: Sponsor storytelling
items.description: Package activations, payouts, and community reactions into narratives sponsors can drop straight into their own channels.

wallet.helper: Use the top bar to connect your wallet and get your Spray ready.

SprayDisperser.heading: Send rewards in one clean shot
SprayDisperser.description: Paste wallets, pick a network, and Spray rewards in one go instead of sending them one by one.

network.prompt: Connect a wallet to get started with Spray.

form.trustedTokenPlaceholder: Choose a token or use custom

activity.title: Latest sprays
activity.empty: No sprays yet—send a small test sprint ✨

errors.invalidToken: Provide a valid ERC20 token address.
errors.invalidRecipient: All recipients must be valid addresses.
errors.invalidAmount: Enter a positive amount for each recipient.
errors.needsApproval: Approve token spend for the Spray contract first.

gooddollar.title: GoodDollar Rewards for Verified Builders
gooddollar.subtitle: Claim a small G$ reward for using DenLabs on Celo, and invite other verified builders to join.

states.noWallet: Connect your wallet on Celo to see if you are eligible for GoodDollar rewards.

noSelf.description: You need to complete Self verification in DenLabs before you can claim GoodDollar rewards. This keeps rewards sybil-resistant and aligned with real humans.

ineligible.description: You are currently not eligible to claim a GoodDollar reward from this app.
ineligible.hint: This usually means you already claimed in the last 180 days, you reached the limit of eligible apps, or your GoodDollar account is not fully verified yet.

claimed.success: Your GoodDollar reward has been claimed successfully!

appInfo.distribution: Current distribution: {user}% to you and {inviter}% to the inviter.

invite.title: Share your invite link
invite.description: Share this link with other builders. When they claim using your link, part of the GoodDollar reward can be shared with you.

notes.limits: Note: A user can only claim once per app every 180 days and from at most 3 different apps in any 180-day period, and must be whitelisted in GoodDollar.

faq.title: How GoodDollar Rewards work in DenLabs
faq.item1: DenLabs uses Self verification to keep rewards sybil-resistant before calling the GoodDollar Engagement Rewards contract.
faq.item2: GoodDollar checks if your account is whitelisted and if you are within the global and per-app limits before allowing the claim.
faq.item3: Each successful claim sends a small amount of G$ to you, and optionally to the inviter address captured from the invite link.

errors.generic: Something went wrong while checking your eligibility. Please try again or come back later.
errors.claimFailed: Your claim could not be processed. Make sure your GoodDollar account is verified, you haven't claimed recently, and that you are connected to the correct wallet on Celo.

Scan8004.title: 8004 Scan
Scan8004.description: Trust verification scanner for addresses and identifiers. Check reputation scores, verify credentials, and assess trustworthiness before collaborating.

form.label: Address or Identifier
form.placeholder: Enter wallet address, ENS, or identifier
form.hint: Provide a blockchain address, ENS name, or any identifier to scan

errors.emptyInput: Please enter an address or identifier to scan
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

info.title: About 8004 Scan
info.description: 8004 scan helps you verify trust scores and reputation before engaging with addresses or entities. This MVP version provides the foundation for onchain trust verification.

X402.title: x402 Premium
X402.description: Experimental HTTP 402 payment layer for premium access. Test pay-per-use models for advanced analytics, deeper feedback, and priority processing.

concept.title: What is x402?
concept.description: x402 explores HTTP 402 (Payment Required) as a payment layer for premium content and services. Instead of traditional subscriptions, users pay per request for enhanced features.
concept.item1: Pay-per-use model: Only pay for what you consume
concept.item2: Micropayments: Small amounts for individual requests
concept.item3: Transparent pricing: Know the cost upfront for each premium feature

demo.title: Try the Demo
demo.description: Test the x402 endpoint to see current status and available premium features.

example.title: Code Example
example.description: How to use x402 in your application (conceptual):

info.title: About x402
info.description: x402 is an experimental feature exploring micropayments for premium access. This MVP demonstrates the concept without real payment processing.

A2A.title: A2A - Agent-to-Agent
A2A.description: Discover and expose agent capabilities for interoperability. Enable AI agents to find and interact with DenLabs services programmatically.

concept.title: What is A2A?
concept.description: Agent-to-Agent (A2A) enables different AI agents and automated systems to discover each other's capabilities and interact seamlessly.
concept.item1: Capability Discovery: Agents can query what services are available
concept.item2: Standardized Interfaces: Common protocols for agent communication
concept.item3: Interoperability: Different agents can work together effectively

test.title: Test Capabilities
test.description: Query DenLabs agent capabilities and available endpoints.

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.case1Description: Agents can automatically verify trust scores before initiating collaborations
useCases.case2Description: Different platforms can discover and use DenLabs services programmatically
useCases.case3Description: Multiple agents can coordinate workflows using DenLabs capabilities

info.title: About A2A
info.description: A2A is an experimental feature for agent interoperability. This MVP provides static capability discovery as a foundation for dynamic agent coordination.
